Tucson knew he had done the right thing, waiting for Rodimus to make the fi=
rst important decision.  He would have done the same for his offspring if h=
e had any.  Which brought him to think about Talon, and his future with her=
.  His love for her would never wane, and now, more than ever, he wanted so=
 much to strengthen their bond.  But he had to conscentrate on the tasks at=
 hand now.  After all, like Rodimus He too must carry himself like a Prime.=
  He gives a smile of approval, as Straight Shot transforms and connects he=
rself to his back, in cross bow mode.  

" Now that we have Nightlight, Rod=
imus and Windlord back with us here, it's time to think about how we're goi=
ng to weaken Hydras and the insectoids, thus returning this planet to a mor=
e peaceful state of being.  We were not the only ones affected by Hydras, I=
'm sure of it, so if we do this in our honor, we should carry out our missi=
on for the preservation of this planet, and the innocent who reside here.  =
After all, it's what we do best, all of us."
